title: Durendal
summaries: The Durendal is a Hardmode whip crafted from Hallowed Bars. Like most other whips, it causes minions to focus on the last-struck enemy and increases their damage against the target.

After the whip strikes an enemy, it will grant the Durendal's Blessing buff, increasing attack speed by 25% for 3 seconds, and the buff duration can be refreshed by hitting enemies with the Durendal again.
If the Durendal hits multiple targets in a single attack, the damage dealt by each consecutive hit will be reduced by 20%.
